participant_1.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i work at a nursing home. my wife left me and took my children.

content.text: hello, how are you today? I just got back from the human field
